title.rendered: Public M&A and Equity Capital Markets

content.rendered:
With broad and deep experience of the stock market, its transactions and regulatory systems, we add value for clients in strategic and structural issues.

Our Public M&A and Equity Capital Markets practice group advises on public M&A transactions, initial public offerings, demergers, rights issues and private placements. The practice group also provides advice on disclosure matters, corporate governance and company law.

We advise listed companies, private equity houses, banks, sovereign entities, and investors seeking Nordic investment opportunities.

For over 35 years, we have guided some of Sweden’s most significant public M&A transactions, initial public offerings, demergers and rights issues. We serve both major listed companies and companies in the earliest stages of preparing for their listings, guiding them through every phase of their journey as public companies.

The team actively participates in the development of self-regulation and best market practices on the Swedish stock market. Our practitioners are members of key bodies such as the Swedish Securities Council, the Stock Market Self-Regulation Committee (ASK), Nasdaq Stockholm’s Listing Committee and Nasdaq Stockholm’s Disciplinary Committee. Members of the team also participate in the working groups proposing amendments to the Swedish Takeover Rules, the Remuneration Rules and recommendations on Private Placements.
